Text:
This a great album and it proves that poison still has what it takes. even if this is a album of cover songs. they do thier own little spin on every song on this album and they all sound unique to poison. i highly recomend this download.

on another note. not sure if it is on the foriegn release or a bonus track but CC Deville mentioned on in a  online radio interview that poison did a cover of justin timberlakes "sexy back" for this album. if anyone has this please upload and let us know.
Comment to Kisstokill, read more about Poison/Justin Timberlake at this web site : http://www.stereogum.com/archives/mp3/poison-try-to-bring-sexyback-and-fail.html

Here is the bonus track, Poison doing a cover of Justin Timberlakes, Sexy Back...

http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3729632/Poison_-_Poisond_(Bonus_Track)_[Poison_feat._Justin_Timberlake]

I have downloaded the discography torrent easily that you uploaded. Thank You very much!
